item.description:
This is a 6 week intermediate dance class that combines a half hour of each style starting with tap, ballet/lyrical, and jazz/ hip hop. We will teach different combinations and techniques that will give you a great workout and review many styles of dance you may not have practiced in a while. We do suggest that you have done some dance in the past.

You must sign up for this class before January 3, 2012 at www.bridgetsdancestudio.com Limited spots available. Class will be $90 and is due on the first class.

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Dance (tap/ballet/jazz)
